import React, { Fragment, useState, useContext } from "react"; import { OrderContext } from "./index"; import UpdateOrderModal from "./UpdateOrderModal"; import SearchFilter from "./SearchFilter"; import { filterOrder } from "./Actions"; const OrderMenu = (props) => { const { data, dispatch } = useContext(OrderContext); const [dropdown, setDropdown] = useState(false); return (
{/* It's open the add order modal */}
setDropdown(!dropdown)} className="flex items-center cursor-pointer rounded-full overflow-hidden p-2 justify-center" > Filter
filterOrder("All", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > All filterOrder( "Not processed", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown ) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Not processed filterOrder( "Under Scrutiny", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown ) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Under Scrutiny filterOrder("Request Accepted", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Request Accepted filterOrder( "Expired", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown ) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Expired Organs filterOrder( "Cancelled", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown ) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Organ Request Cancelled
{/**/}
); }; export default OrderMenu;
